name: Amethyst Requiem Pt.1
description:
Annabelle awakens in a hazy land of nightmares in which she must face the horrors of her past. From the mourning of her dead sister to the mass murder of her childhood captors, she fights herself inside her own mind.

Controls:

Move: Arrow Keys

Interact: Enter

Menu: Esc

Piano Controls:

A (Lower) = A

A# = W

B = S

C = D

C# = R

D = F

D# = T

E = G

F = H

F# = U

G = J

G# = I

A (Upper) = K
